title: Tim's Tome
author: Archivist Eryndra
pages: Tim the Enchanter's treatises are captivating compilations on enchantment, unraveling the power bound within spirits and runes.
His explanations cast light onto enchantments' marvels and hazards, offering wisdom for pragmatism and aspiration.
Penning five spellbinding books, Tim perpetuates an era of enchantment's allure, weaving dreams for the daring and studious alike.
